name: Notice.AAA6.GeneralApps.NonUrgentApplicationMade.Respondent
titleEn: The other parties have requested a change to the case
titleCy: Mae’r partïon eraill wedi gofyn am newid yr achos
descriptionEn: Review their request and respond to it by 4pm on ${generalAppNotificationDeadlineDateEn}. After this date, the application will go to a judge who’ll decide what the next steps will be. Review and respond to the request
descriptionCy: Dylech adolygu eu cais ac ymateb iddo erbyn 4pm ar ${generalAppNotificationDeadlineDateCy}. Ar ôl y dyddiad hwn, bydd y cais yn mynd at farnwr a fydd yn penderfynu beth fydd y camau nesaf. Adolygu ac ymateb i’r cais
